graph_title: Proportion of households with access to electricity
indicator_name: Proportion of households with access to electricity
national_indicator_description: The main source of information is a Integrated Living Conditions Survey (ILCS) (https://www.armstat.am/en/?nid=82&id=2217).
computation_calculations: The indicator is calculated by dividing the number of households with electricity by the total number of households.
comments_limitations: The main source of information is a Integrated Living Conditions Survey (ILCS) (https://www.armstat.am/en/?nid=82&id=2217)
source_organisation_2: Integrated Living Conditions Survey of households (ILCS)
